[Groovy] Class ZipUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.github.jlgrock.closuretoolslibrary.utils.io.ZipUtils

class ZipUtils

A general usage class for doing zip file and zip stream manipulations.

Unzip all Zipfile contents to a directory.
throws:

Parameters:

outputDir - the location to put the artifacts from the zipfile

unzip

Unzip Zipfile contents matching zipEntryName to a directory.
throws:
IOException if unable to read from the zip stream
Parameters:
zis - the stream of the zipFile to extract artifacts from
zipEntryName - the name of the file within the zip to extract
outputDir - the location to put the artifacts from the zipfile

zipFolder

static final void zipFolder(java.io.File inFolder, java.io.File destinationFile)
Zip up a directory and store it into a zip file.
throws:
IOException If unable to read files from the inFolder or write to the destinationFile
Parameters:
inFolder - the Folder to zip up
destinationFile - the archive file that you would like to create
